casebody.data:
George M. HAIGHT, Receiver of Salt Springs Bank, Appellee, v. FIRST TRUST & DEPOSIT COMPANY, as Trustee of John S. Conway, Appellant. No. 270. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 13, 1940. Hiscoclc, Cowie, Bruce & Lee, of Syracuse, N. Y. (H. Duane Bruce, of Syracuse, N. Y., pf counsel), for appellant. Keith F. Driscoll, of Syracuse, N. Y., for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment, 33 F.Supp. 72, affirmed on the authority of Strasburger v. Schram, 68 App.D.C. 87, 93 F.2d 246, and Reich v. Van Dyke, 3 Cir., 107 F.2d 682.
